content: I've created my PR, but when I comment propose #385 on the original issue, task 239, I get the error "Process completed with exit code 5". This is preventing my PR from being moved to the InProgress column.
@Kevin Buzzard Could you please renew the PAT_TOKEN? It's likely the source of the error here.
I believe I renewed it on Sunday but does the actual token change and so I need to do something else? Sorry Madison
OK hopefully I just sorted this out (thanks to Pietro!)

It still doesn’t seem to work… https://github.com/ImperialCollegeLondon/FLT/actions/runs/14205213731/job/39801341078

Sorry but I’m from mobile now. I’ll take a closer look later or tomorrow.

Tested quickly on other projects (#Equational and #Infinity-Cosmos) and it works fine.

The error can be very easily explained by an invalid PAT_TOKEN, but…

Anyway, I’ll take a look later.

Now it works properly.

@Madison Crim feel free to comment with propose #385 again.

Sorry for the inconvenience.
Pietro Monticone has marked this topic as resolved.
